name: quilling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of making designs by rolling and shaping narrow strips of paper: Quilling is a very relaxing hobby. There are also courses on paper quilling, gift wrapping, and bow making.
More examplesFewer examplesTwo years ago, Betty bought a beginner's quilling set and set out to make a card.Anyone interested in taking up quilling should contact their local library which should be able to provide a quilling handbook.Paper quilling is an enjoyable way to create whimsical novelties or masterful works of art.
